name: An American Blood Clot in Techno Athens
name_original: An American Blood Clot in Techno Athens
description:
₪ Welcome to the artery of civilization: 𝓣𝓔𝓒𝓗𝓝𝓞 𝓐𝓣𝓗𝓔𝓝𝓢 ₪

A blood clot like yourself, especially an American blood clot, is not welcome here.

Solve trials and troubles only comparable to that of an organism's inner workings and meet face to face with your significant clot. Your life is your greatest resource.

Trust your heart.

It will forgive you, 𝓣𝓔𝓒𝓗𝓝𝓞 𝓐𝓣𝓗𝓔𝓝𝓢 will not.

₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪

Jumping and spawning a platform will cut into your life and shrink you.

Keyboard Controls:

WASD: Move • Spacebar: Jump • J: Spawn platform

Xbox controls:

Joystick: Move • A Button: Jump • X Button: Spawn platform

₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪₪
